column2: English
Training
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE ARE READY TO BEGIN OUR ASSAULT. WAITING FOR THE CODE WORD. OVER.
ALPHA STANDING BY. OVER.
THATS NEGATIVE BRAVO. STAY OFF THE AIR UNTIL WE HEAR FROM HQ. OVER.
BE ADVISED PAPA BEAR THAT WE ARE GOOD TO GO. PLEASE CONFIRM YOUR ORDERS. OVER.
COPY THAT PAPA BEAR. MISSION IS ABORTED, I REPEAT ABORTING MISSION. HEADING BACK TO HOME. ALPHA OUT.
PAPA BEAR WE ARE AT THE BASE AND WAITING FOR FURTHER ORDERS. OVER.
ROGER PAPA BEAR. ON OUR WAY. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA TO BRAVO. WHEN WE GET TO THE AIRBASE, YOU PROCEED AND CLEAR THE AIRBASE HANGAR BUILDINGS. WE WILL COVER THE SURROUNDING AREA. OVER.
STAY SHARP BRAVO. WE HAVE NO IDEA WHERE WE ARE WALKING INTO. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAD AN EXPLOSION IN THE AIRBASE. I REPEAT WE HAD SEVERE EXPLOSION IN THE AIRBASE. SEVERAL AIRCRAFTS DESTROYED. OVER.
KEEP IT TOGETHER BRAVO. FOCUS ON SWEEPING THE CENTER OF AIRBASE. SEE IF THERE ARE ANY WOUNDED YOU CAN HELP. OVER.
ROGER THAT PAPA BEAR. ALPHA BLACK OUT.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE MULTIPLE CASUALTIES HERE. REQUESTING ADDITIONAL BACKUP TO SECURE THE AIRBASE AND MEDICAL ASSISTANCE. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. SEEMS THAT ALL THE RUSSIANS ARE DEAD. OVER.
ROGER THAT ALPHA. BRAVO COVERS AIRBASE HANGARS. BRAVO OUT.
ALPHA THIS IS BRAVO. ANY IDEA WHATS GOING ON. OVER.
OH MY GOD...
GODDAMN ALPHA. THIS IS JUST HORRIBLE...
THIS IS CHARLIE BLACK. WE HAVE UNKNOWN BOAT ON NORTH-EAST FROM THE BASE. OVER.
CONFIRMED. SPEZ NATZ LANDING BOAT IN THE BEACH. BE ADVICED, WE HAVE A SPEZ NATZ CONFIRMED ON THE AIRBASE. CHARLIE OUT.
THIS IS DELTA BLACK. WE HAVE UNKNOWN BOAT ON NORTH-EAST FROM THE BASE. OVER.
CONFIRMED. SPEZ NATZ LANDING BOAT IN THE BEACH. BE ADVICED, WE HAVE A SPEZ NATZ CONFIRMED ON THE AIRBASE. DELTA OUT.
ALL FORCES BE ADVICED. WE HAVE ENEMY ENGAGEMENTS ON MORTON AND WE HAVE LOST CONTACT TO THE AIRBASE.
ALPHA BLACK PROCEED IMMEDIATELY TO THE AIRBASE IN THE NORTH AND ESTABLISH WHY THERE IS NO REPLY FROM RADIO COMMS. USE CAUTION WE DO NOT KNOW WHAT TO EXPECT. PAPA BEAR OUT.
WE HAVE SITUATION DEVELOPING. STAND BY ALPHA.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ABORT ABORT ABORT. I REPEAT ABORT THE MISSION. OVER.
ABORT YOUR MISSION IMMEDIATELY ALPHA BLACK. HEAD BACK TO BASE AND WAIT FOR FURTHER ORDERS. PAPA BEAR OUT.
WE ARE TRYING TO ROUTE REINFORCEMENTS TO THE AIRBASE. YOUR ORDERS ARE TO SECURE THE AIRBASE. CLEAR OUT THE BEACH, SPEZ NATZ BOAT WAS LOCATED THERE. GOOD LUCK ALPHA BLACK. PAPA BEAR OUT.
SPEZ NATZ ARE DEAD, AIRBASE IS SECURE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. AIRBASE SECURED. MISSION COMPLETED. PAPA BEAR OUT.
